00064 void cleanup(int ret)
00065 {
00066   // stop all mpi clients
00067 
00068 #ifdef MPI
00069   int task=TASKFIN;
00070   BroadcastTask(&task);
00071 
00072   MPI_Finalize();
00073 #endif
00074  
00075   // terminate program with return code
00076   exit(ret);
00077 }

00080 int main(int argc, char *argv[])
00081 {
00082   createinfo(argc, argv);
00083 
00084 #ifdef MPI
00085   MPI_Init(&argc, &argv);
00086   MPI_Comm_rank(MPI_COMM_WORLD, &mpirank);
00087   MPI_Comm_size(MPI_COMM_WORLD, &mpisize);
00088 
00089   // fprintf(stderr, "... [%2d] %s\n", mpirank, hostname());
00090 
00091   if (mpirank != 0) {
00092     MinimizerSlaveod();
00093     MPI_Finalize();
00094     exit(0);
00095   } else {
00096 #endif
00097 
00098   int c;
00099   int cm=1;
00100   int par=0;
00101   int overwrite=0;
00102   int maxsteps=250;
00103   double shakemag=0.0;
00104   int constT2=0, constS2=0, constJ2=0, constLS=0;
00105   int constmradius=0, constmquadrupole=0;

00107   double constT2val=0.0, constS2val=0.0, constJ2val=0.0, constLSval=0.0;

00111   /*
00112   int constl2=0, constls=0, constj2=0;
00113   int constmradius=0, constmquadrupole=0, constmoctupole=0;

00122 
00123   // first constraint is ConstraintCM
00124   // special handling as it is of type Constraint and not Constraintod
00125   Constraintod Const[MAXCONSTRAINT];
00126   int nconst = 1;
00127 
00128   if (argc < 3) {
00129     fprintf(stderr, "\nusage: %s interaction slaterdetfile\n"

00131             "\n   -o              overwrite in all cases"
00132             "\n   -m MAXSTEPS     maximum number of steps (default %d)"
00133             "\n   -s MAGNITUDE    shake parameters before minimization"
00134             "\n   -C              constrain center of mass"
00135             "\n   -T T2           constrain isospin"

00140             "\n   -D DIPOLE       constrain dipole moments"
00141             "\n   -Q QUADRUPOLE   constrain quadrupole moments"
00142             "\n   -O OCTUPOLE     constrain octupole moments"
00143             "\n   -B BETA         constrain quadrupole deformation"
00144             "\n   -G GAMMA        constrain quadrupole deformation\n"
00145             // "\n   -M              constrain main axes of quadrupole tensor"
00146             // "\n   -I Jz           cranking constrain"
00147             , argv[0], maxsteps);
00148     cleanup(-1);
00149   }
00150   
00151   while((c = getopt(argc, argv, "p:om:s:CT:L:S:J:R:D:Q:O:B:G:")) != -1)
00152     switch (c) {
00153     case 'p':
00154       par = atoi(optarg);
00155       break;
00156     case 'o':
00157       overwrite = 1;
00158       break;
00159     case 'm':
00160       maxsteps = atoi(optarg);
00161       break;
00162     case 's':
00163       shakemag = atof(optarg);
00164       break;
00165     case 'T':
00166       constT2 = 1;
00167       constT2val = atof(optarg);
00168       break;
00169     case 'L':
00170       constLS = 1;
00171       constLSval = atof(optarg);
00172       break;
00173     case 'S':
00174       constS2 = 1;
00175       constS2val = atof(optarg);
00176       break;
00177     case 'J':
00178       constJ2 = 1;
00179       constJ2val = atof(optarg);
00180       break;
00181     case 'R':
00182       if (optarg[0] == 'E') {
00183         consteradius = 1;
00184         consterval = atof(optarg+2);
00185       } else {
00186         constmradius = 1;
00187         constmrval = atof(optarg);
00188       }
00189       break;
00190       /*
00191     case 'D':
00192       constedipole = 1;
00193       constedval = atof(optarg);
00194       break;

00196     case 'Q':
00197       if (optarg[0] == 'E') {
00198         constequadrupole = 1;
00199         consteqval = atof(optarg+2);
00200       } else {
00201         constmquadrupole = 1;
00202         constmqval = atof(optarg);
00203       }
00204       break;
00205       /*
00206     case 'O':
00207       if (optarg[0] == 'E') {
00208         consteoctupole = 1;
00209         consteoval = atof(optarg+2);
00210       } else {
00211         constmoctupole = 1;
00212         constmoval = atof(optarg);

00214       break;

00216       constbeta = 1;

00218       break;

00220       constgamma = 1;
00221       constgval = atof(optarg);
00222       break;

00224     }
00225   
00226   if (constT2) {
00227     Const[nconst] = ConstraintT2od;
00228     Const[nconst].val = constT2val;
00229     nconst++;
00230   }
00231   if (constS2) {
00232     Const[nconst] = ConstraintS2od;
00233     Const[nconst].val = constS2val;
00234     nconst++;
00235   }
00236   /*
00237   if (constl2) {
00238     Const[nconst] = Constraintl2;

00242   if (constls) {
00243     Const[nconst] = Constraintls;
00244     Const[nconst].val = constlsval;

00248   if (constJ2) {

00253   if (constLS) {

00255     Const[nconst].val = constLSval;
00256     nconst++;
00257   }
00258   if (constmradius) {
00259     Const[nconst] = ConstraintR2od;
00260     Const[nconst].val = SQR(constmrval);
00261     nconst++;
00262   }
00263   if (consteradius) {
00264     Const[nconst] = ConstraintER2od;

00268   /*

00274   */
00275   if (constmquadrupole) {
00276     Const[nconst] = ConstraintQ2od;
00277     Const[nconst].val = constmqval;
00278     nconst++;
00279   }
00280   if (constequadrupole) {
00281     Const[nconst] = ConstraintEQ2od;
00282     Const[nconst].val = consteqval;
00283     nconst++;
00284   }
00285   /*
00286   if (constmoctupole) {
00287     Const[nconst] = ConstraintO2;

00292     Const[nconst] = ConstraintEO2;
00293     Const[nconst].val = consteoval;
00294     nconst++;
00295   }
00296   if (constbeta) {
00297     Const[nconst] = ConstraintQ2;
00298     Const[nconst].val = sqrt(24*M_PI/5)*constbval;
00299     nconst++;
00300   }
00301   if (constgamma) {
00302     if (!constbeta) {
00303       fprintf(stderr, "gamma constraint only in combination with beta constraint\n");
00304       exit(-1);
00305     }
00306     Const[nconst] = ConstraintDetQ;
00307     Const[nconst].val = sqrt(4*M_PI/5)*constbval*cbrt(2*cos(3*constgval*M_PI/180));
00308     nconst++;
00309   }
00310   */
00311 
00312   char* interactionfile = argv[optind];
00313   char* parafile = argv[optind+1];
00314 
00315   Interaction Int;
00316   if (readInteractionfromFile(&Int, interactionfile))
00317     cleanup(-1);
00318   Int.cm = cm;
00319 
00320 #ifdef MPI
00321   BroadcastInteraction(&Int);
00322 #endif
00323 
00324   Parameterization P;
00325   Para qinitial;
00326   if (readParafromFile(&P, &qinitial, parafile))
00327     cleanup(-1);
00328 
00329   SlaterDet Q, Qp;
00330   SlaterDetAux X;
00331 
00332   P.ParainitSlaterDet(&qinitial, &Q);
00333   P.ParainitSlaterDet(&qinitial, &Qp);
00334   if (!par)
00335     par = (Q.A % 2) ? -1 : +1;
00336 
00337   initSlaterDetAux(&Q, &X);
00338   P.ParatoSlaterDet(&qinitial, &Q);
00339   P.ParatoSlaterDet(&qinitial, &Q);
00340 
00341 #ifdef MPI
00342   BroadcastA(&Q.A);
00343 #endif
00344 
00345   complex double hd, hp, nd, np;
00346   double einitial, eintr;
00347 
00348   moveboostorientSlaterDet(&Q, &X);
00349 
00350   calcSlaterDetAuxod(&Q, &Q, &X);
00351   nd = X.ovlap;
00352   calcHamiltonianod(&Int, &Q, &Q, &X, &hd);
00353   eintr = hd/nd;
00354 
00355   copySlaterDet(&Q, &Qp);
00356   invertSlaterDet(&Qp);
00357   calcSlaterDetAuxod(&Q, &Qp, &X);
00358   np = X.ovlap;
00359   calcHamiltonianod(&Int, &Q, &Qp, &X, &hp);
00360   
00361   einitial = (hd+par*hp)/(nd+par*np);
00362 
00363   int i;
00364   for (i=1; i<nconst; i++)
00365     fprintf(stderr, "# constraining %4s to %8.3f\n", 
00366             Const[i].label, Const[i].output(Const[i].val)); 
00367 
00368   fprintf(stderr, "\ninitial:\tE = %8.3f MeV,   Eintr = %8.3f MeV\n\n", 
00369           hbc*einitial, hbc*eintr);
00370 
00371   Para q;
00372   P.Paraclone(&qinitial, &q);
00373 
00374   // shaking the parameters ?
00375   if (shakemag) {
00376     shakePara(&q, shakemag);
00377   }
00378 
00379   // in FMD parameterization move to origin in phase space
00380   // if (!strcmp(P.name, "FMD")) {
00381   //   P.ParatoSlaterDet(&q, &Q);
00382   //   moveboostorientSlaterDet(&Q, &X);
00383   //   SlaterDetinitFMD(&Q, &q);
00384   // }
00385 
00386   // minimize !
00387   MinimizeDONLP2par(&Int, par, Const, nconst, &P, &q, maxsteps); 
00388 
00389   double e;
00390   P.ParatoSlaterDet(&q, &Q);
00391 
00392   calcSlaterDetAuxod(&Q, &Q, &X);
00393   nd = X.ovlap;
00394   calcHamiltonianod(&Int, &Q, &Q, &X, &hd);
00395   eintr = hd/nd;
00396 
00397   copySlaterDet(&Q, &Qp);
00398   invertSlaterDet(&Qp);
00399   calcSlaterDetAuxod(&Q, &Qp, &X);
00400   np = X.ovlap;
00401   calcHamiltonianod(&Int, &Q, &Qp, &X, &hp);
00402   
00403   e = (hd+par*hp)/(nd+par*np);
00404 
00405   fprintf(stderr, "\nfinal:  \tE = %8.3f MeV\n\n", hbc*e);
00406 
00407   // output files
00408 
00409   // backup of parafile
00410 
00411   backup(parafile);
00412 
00413   // save minimization result in MIN directory
00414   {
00415     P.ParatoSlaterDet(&q, &Q);
00416 
00417     // orient SlaterDet
00418     moveboostorientSlaterDet(&Q, &X);
00419 
00420     // in FMD parameterization we copy the relocated SlaterDet
00421     if (!strcmp(P.name, "FMD"))
00422       SlaterDetinitFMD(&Q, &q);
00423 
00424     // calculate the observables
00425     Observables Obs;
00426   
00427     calcObservablesParity(&Int, par, &Q, &Obs);
00428 
00429     ensuredir("MIN");
00430     char outfile[1024];
00431     sprintf(outfile, "MIN/%s-minpar.%d", parafile, (int) time(NULL));
00432 
00433     fprintf(stderr, "... writing Parameters to file %s\n", outfile);
00434 
00435     FILE* outfp;
00436     if (!(outfp = fopen(outfile, "w"))) {
00437       fprintf(stderr, "couldn't open %s for writing\n", outfile);
00438       cleanup(-1);
00439     }
00440 
00441     fprintinfo(outfp);
00442 
00443     fprintf(outfp, "\n# minimized %s for %s in %s parameterization\n"
00444             "# parity projected to %+d\n"
00445             "# using %s interaction\n", 
00446             cm ? "< Hintr >" : "< H >", q.name, P.name, par, Int.name);
00447   
00448     fprintf(outfp, "# einitial: %8.3f MeV\n", hbc*einitial);
00449     fprintf(outfp, "# efinal:   %8.3f MeV\n", hbc*e);
00450 
00451     fprintObservables(outfp, &Int, &Q, &Obs);
00452 
00453     fprintf(outfp, "\n# Parameterization\n");
00454     fprintf(outfp, "<Parameterization %s>\n", P.name);
00455     P.Parawrite(outfp, &q);
00456  
00457     fprintf(outfp, "\n# SlaterDet\n");
00458     writeSlaterDet(outfp, &Q);
00459 
00460     fclose(outfp);  
00461   }
00462 
00463   // save minimization result in parafile
00464   {
00465     // no improvement ? then write initial parameters
00466     if (!overwrite && einitial < e) 
00467       P.Paraclone(&qinitial, &q);
00468 
00469     P.ParatoSlaterDet(&q, &Q);
00470 
00471     // orient SlaterDet
00472     moveboostorientSlaterDet(&Q, &X);
00473 
00474     // in FMD parameterization we copy the relocated SlaterDet
00475     if (!strcmp(P.name, "FMD"))
00476       SlaterDetinitFMD(&Q, &q);
00477 
00478     // calculate the observables
00479     Observables Obs;
00480   
00481     calcObservablesParity(&Int, par, &Q, &Obs);
00482 
00483     fprintf(stderr, "... writing Parameters to file %s\n", parafile);
00484 
00485     FILE* outfp;
00486     if (!(outfp = fopen(parafile, "w"))) {
00487       fprintf(stderr, "couldn't open %s for writing\n", parafile);
00488       cleanup(-1);
00489     }
00490 
00491     fprintinfo(outfp);
00492 
00493     fprintf(outfp, "\n# minimized %s for %s in %s parameterization\n"
00494             "# parity projected to %+d\n"
00495             "# using %s interaction\n", 
00496             cm ? "< Hintr >" : "< H >", q.name, P.name, par, Int.name);
00497   
00498     fprintf(outfp, "\n# einitial: %8.3f MeV\n", hbc*einitial);
00499     fprintf(outfp, "# efinal:   %8.3f MeV\n", hbc*e);
00500 
00501     if (overwrite)
00502       fprintf(outfp, "\n# overwrite flag: use new parameters\n\n");
00503     if (!overwrite && einitial < e)
00504       fprintf(outfp, "\n# no improvement by minimization: use initial parameters\n\n");
00505 
00506     fprintObservables(outfp, &Int, &Q, &Obs);
00507 
00508     fprintf(outfp, "\n# Parameterization\n");
00509     fprintf(outfp, "<Parameterization %s>\n", P.name);
00510     P.Parawrite(outfp, &q);
00511  
00512     fprintf(outfp, "\n# SlaterDet\n");
00513     writeSlaterDet(outfp, &Q);
00514 
00515     fclose(outfp);  
00516   }
00517 
00518   fprintf(stderr, "... %4.2f minutes computing time used\n", usertime()/60.0);
00519 
00520   cleanup(0);
00521 
00522 #ifdef MPI
00523   }
00524 #endif
